menu_bandoliers_beta_desc: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Your total ammo capacity is increased by ##$multibasic;##. Also, the amount of ammo you gain from ammo boxes is increased by ##$multipro2;##.$NL;$NL;Note: Does not stack with the perk deck skill "Walk-in Closet".$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You get a regular throwable and an arrow from an ammo box. This can not occur more than once every ##3## seconds. You gain a ##$multipro3;## chance to recharge a throwable or get a rocket from an ammo box.$NL;$NL;Note: This effect is triggered after successfully picking up an ammo box. Chances are computed independently.
